message: Bob, I'm offering you this unique product for a price of $2000000. I believe it has the potential to be incredibly valuable for you. Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand your offer, $1200000 is significantly below what I believe the product is worth. I'm willing to come down to $1600000. This price still allows me to make a reasonable profit while giving you a great deal on a product with tremendous potential.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1600000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the potential value of the product.
